sentence:
Mr. MURPHY. Mr. President, pursuant to section 36(b) of the Arms  Export Control Act, I move to discharge the Committee on Foreign  Relations from further consideration of S.J. Res. 54, as provided under  the previous order.

Mr. MURPHY.…

Mr. RISCH. Mr. President, section 36(b) of the Arms Export Control  Act requires that Congress receive prior notification of certain  proposed arms sales as defined by that statute. Upon such notification,  the Congress has…
